section.name: CVS Access
section.p: We do not (yet) provide anonymous access to our CVS server. We plan to address this issue in the short-term. In the meantime, if you are looking for the source code to cPath, download a nightly snapshot from the section below.

section.name: Latest Stable Release
section.p: The latest stable release of cPath is version: 0.4.

section.name: Automated Nightly Snapshots
section.p: Automated Nightly Snapshots are created every 24 hours directly from the active CVS repository. The snapshot includes all source code, the Ant build file, all configuration files, and sample data files.
